ygData.subject: Re: Runed totem staffs...buying them
ygData.msgSnippet: what level are you? if you re 12 and up, you can go to lake rathe or to the splitpaw gnoll dungeon, and get one yourself (witha group). i went to splitpaw with
ygData.messageBody:
what level are you? if you re 12 and up, you can go to lake rathe or to the
splitpaw gnoll dungeon, and get one yourself (witha group). i went to
splitpaw with a group and we got 6, kept 3 and sold the other 3 for 25 plat
each. i have seen them sell for as much as forty and as little as 15pp.

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 18th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

where t will be cheaper..?
> thanks for the advice in advance , it will prolly help a lot of people when
>the info gets posted on the list
>
>Tildin, Enchanter Extraodinare
>Propieter of Tildin's Emporium
>Tunare Server
>a.k.a Mark Prescott
